name.value: Medication Process 9 3.0.0-beta - MedicationAgreement - Serve - Scenario 0.2 - target CheckContent - JSON Format

description.value: Scenario 0.2 - Specifieke medicatieafspraak met identificaties als filter (in kwalificatiesimulator het id van "MBH_300_script0_QA1_MA" invoeren) (Antwoord: bericht met 1 medicatieafspraak)
Resource.id for MedicationRequest 1
Specifieke medicatieafspraak met identificaties als filter (in kwalificatiesimulator het id van "MBH_300_script0_QA1_MA" invoeren) (Antwoord: bericht met 1 medicatieafspraak)
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2020.01/FHIR_IG#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.
Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension).
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s).
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 2 entries. (Consists of 1 MedicationRequest and 1 Medication resources.)
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR MedicationRequest that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 MedicationRequest
MedicationRequest resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationAgreement'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RegistrationDateTime' with .valueDateTime
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RenderedDosageInstruction' with .valueString with a value

Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-TimeInterval.Period' with .valuePeriod with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-TimeInterval.Duration' with .valueDuration with .value '5' and .unit with a value and .system and .code 'd' and .start

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-TimeInterval.Period').value.where($this is Period).where(extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-TimeInterval.Duration').value.where($this is Duration).where(value = 5 and unit.hasValue() and system and code = 'd') and start).exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier' with .valueIdentifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier').value.where($this is Identifier).where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'unknown'
Contains .intent 'order'
Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '33633005' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').category.where(coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '33633005' and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .medicationReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').medication.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').subject.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .requester with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').requester.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction with .timing with .repeat with .frequency with ... and .period '1' and .periodUnit 'd', and .route with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and .code '21' and .display, and .doseAndRate with .doseQuantity with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '0.7' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '233' and .value '0.7' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code 'ml'. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(timing.repeat.where( and period = 1 and periodUnit = 'd') and route.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and code = '21' and display) and doseAndRate.where(dose.where($this is Quantity).where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 0.7 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '233') and value = 0.7 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = 'ml'))).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.timing with .repeat with .frequency with ... and .period '1' and .periodUnit 'd'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-13 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(timing.repeat.where( and period = 1 and periodUnit = 'd').exists()).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.route with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and .code '21' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-13 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(route.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and code = '21' and display).exists()).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.doseAndRate with .doseQuantity with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '0.7' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '233' and .value '0.7' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code 'ml'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-13 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script0QA1MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(doseAndRate.where(dose.where($this is Quantity).where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 0.7 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '233') and value = 0.7 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = 'ml')).exists()).exists()
